OneStory at BBC #newsHack

04 Jun 2015 /

at #EditorsLab BBC #newsHack hackaton


Tech: HyperTranscript converter, Youtube Captioning API, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS, Git, and Javascript.

As part of the Times team we won the first prize of the BBC News Hack VIII

The Prototype

Itâ€™s a system that allows a journalist easily make a podcast version of a given article. And for the user/viewer, he/she can seamlessly switch between the written article and podcast.
